featured.text: What field of study does the research mentioned in the passage most likely belong to? (A) Psychology.
Who it belonged to or why it was left there is not known.
People in this community tend to _____ with the group they belong to, and often put group interests before personal ones.
Although Mr. Tang claims that the house belongs to him, he has not offered any proof of _____.

definition.en_def: To be the property of someone or something.
